TopicTitle: Ksp white screen and crash after loading bar ends.

Articles.Content: When ever I try to launch the game it either gives me a white screen or it works intill the loading bar reaches the end which then it will freeze and then give me an error then the game closes. I don’t know what happened and I tried to reinstall it but it didn’t fix anything, I need help. This all started after I did alt f4 because when ever I was trying to go to the main menu it would just close the pop up menu for when you pause the game so I couldn’t close the game at all then after I did that I tried to launch but it started to get stuck on “@thumbs” so I did what it said to do online and I deleted all of the “@thumbs” files for mods and base game plus the 2 expansions then it worked for the last time but some mods weren’t working so I closed the game and added them and now it’s doing this, plus I’m now getting other errors that might be related like windows can’t find downloader_helper. For even more content I have a gaming laptop 4.2 ghz and 16 gigs of ram, (asus f15) plz help

Remove the thumbs again, whatever you have now is broken. They will be regenerated a anyway.

Check your freespace on the disk where the game is installed. It may be full, interrupting the thumbs generation, that gets you a broken thumbs, that screws everything.
